ch0002_40_kotone/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been waiting for you!
ch0002_40_kotone/0101_0701_02_10:
Do you want to get some shaved ice? I bet
the first bite after an adventure is really
something special!
ch0002_40_kotone/0601_0701_01_10:
Isn’t Pasio a wonderful place? The scenery here is
so beautiful.
ch0002_40_kotone/0601_0701_02_10:
What I like most about the island is that everyone
here loves Pokémon!
ch0002_40_kotone/0601_0701_03_10:
They’re not just thinking about how to get
stronger but also how to strengthen their bonds
with their Pokémon.
ch0002_40_kotone/0601_0701_04_10: That’s the feeling I get from every sync pair here!
ch0002_40_kotone/0601_0701_05_10:
Seeing all these passionate people just makes me
love Pokémon even more!
ch0002_40_kotone/0602_0701_01_10:
You know, I feel like I’m a little stronger than
usual when I’m with you.
ch0002_40_kotone/0602_0701_02_10:
Like I can try a little harder or walk just a
little further.
ch0002_40_kotone/0602_0701_03_10:
At first, I thought maybe I was trying to show off
as the more experienced Trainer between us.
ch0002_40_kotone/0602_0701_04_10:
But now I realize it’s just my way of showing you
that I want to help you as best as I can!
ch0002_40_kotone/0603_0701_01_10:
Training and battling is all well and good, but if
you really want to become better friends with your
Pokémon, communication is key!
ch0002_40_kotone/0603_0701_02_10:
That means talking to them, playing with them,
even taking in their scents...
ch0002_40_kotone/0603_0701_03_10:
Every Pokémon has its own unique scent,
you know!
ch0002_40_kotone/0603_0701_04_10:
Some have a sweet scent, while others smell more
earthy or grassy. But no matter what scent a
Pokémon has, it’s sure to put you at ease.
ch0002_40_kotone/0604_0701_02_10:
Not only is it super cute, it’s also cool, lightweight,
and easy to move around in.
ch0002_40_kotone/0604_0701_03_10: It’s the perfect outfit to wear for Pokémon battles!
ch0002_40_kotone/0604_0701_04_10:
Whoever designed it is amazing—they know
exactly what girl Trainers want!
ch0002_40_kotone/0605_0701_01_10:
There are so many festival booths to check out that
I keep getting distracted!
ch0002_40_kotone/0605_0701_02_10:
I’m running all over the place trying to visit
them all!
ch0002_40_kotone/0605_0701_03_10:
As the more experienced Trainer, I’m
embarrassed to ask you to do this,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0002_40_kotone/0605_0701_04_10:
but please stop me if you think I’m getting
too excited!
ch0002_40_kotone/1701_0701_01_10:
Here! You can have this! I won it in a raffle at
one of the game booths!
ch0002_40_kotone/1701_0702_01_10:
When you’re drawing a raffle ticket, you have to
believe in your heart that you’ll win!
ch0002_40_kotone/1701_0702_02_10:
And if you don’t, you just have to believe you’ll
definitely win next time and try again!
ch0002_40_kotone/2501_0701_01_10:
Festivals are fun, but then they’re over so fast...
I really don’t like how quiet it gets afterward.
ch0002_40_kotone/2501_0701_02_10:
But when something ends, something new is sure
to begin.
ch0002_40_kotone/2501_0701_03_10: So I can’t waste time being down about it.
ch0002_40_kotone/2501_0701_04_10:
After all, there’s still plenty of fun to be had in the
future, too!
ch0002_40_kotone/2501_0702_01_10:
I want to have a lot of fun experiences with you
and my partner Pokémon in the future, too.
ch0002_40_kotone/2501_0702_02_10:
That’s how I feel, anyway. How about you? I’d be
happy if you felt the same way!
ch0002_40_kotone/2511_0701_01_10:
I want to do what I can to help you out, so I’m
wondering whether there’s something I can
teach you.
ch0002_40_kotone/2511_0701_03_10:
Hmm...I don’t know if I can come up with anything
on my own. Can you help me think of something?
ch0002_40_kotone/2511_0701_04_10: Wait, I shouldn’t be so quick to ask you for help!
ch0002_40_kotone/2511_0702_01_10:
Maybe I’m already teaching you things without
having to put it into words.
ch0002_40_kotone/2511_0702_03_10:
It would make me so happy if the things I’m doing
were helpful to you, even a little!
ch0002_40_kotone/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Are you all set and ready to go
today? I’m ready for some fun!
ch0002_40_kotone/3003_0701_01_10:
Make sure you drink lots of water throughout
the day, OK? Especially when it gets really
hot out!
ch0002_40_kotone/3006_0701_01_10:
Don’t you just love fireworks? They only sparkle
for a moment before disappearing, but that’s
what makes them so beautiful!
